com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.service

Interface DeploymentService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeploymentServiceImpl

    public interface DeploymentService
    This interface represents a service to deploy all the existing process definitions, check if a workflow is deployed and to create and deploy custom process definitions for a batch class.
    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate: 2015-04-14 12:42:19 +0530 (Tue, 14 Apr 2015) $
    $LastChangedRevision: 21594 $
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on Oct 21, 2014

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createAndDeployProcessDefinition(BatchClass batchClass, boolean isGridWorkflow)
      Creates and deploys workflow for the given batch class.
      void deploy(java.lang.String processDefinition)
      Deploys an existing process definition at the given process definition path.
      void deployAll()
      Deploys process definitions for all batch classes.
      boolean isDeployed(java.lang.String processDefinition)
      Checks if a workflow is deployed.
